Appreciate provision of delivery as well.
Thank you!

name: Sofa
description: A young couple with two small children (aged 3 and 4) living in a rental flat is struggling to make ends meet. Their income is barely enough for daily necessities, leaving them with little to spare. They hope to ask for a queen-size storage bed and an L-shaped sofa as their current furniture has become unusable, making rest and comfort at home difficult. On top of that, their fridge is no longer functioning well, causing food to spoil quickly. As a result, they are often forced to eat out, further straining their already tight budget.

name: Milk
description: Client is unemployed due to her pregnancy due in December. She has 5 young dependents presently and is dependent on the financial support from her partner. Client has financial difficulties affording milk powder for her newborn
specifications: Similac Total Comfort H.A (Infant formula)  0 to 12 months (x3)

passiton.name: MyLO Breast Milk Storage Bags
passiton.description:
BRAND NEW! (bought wrongly) 
ESP FOR BREASTFEEDING MUMS WHO ARE WORKING. MyLO Breast Milk Storage Bags come with Oxygen Barrier, Pour Spout and Temperature Sensor. It has a pourable spout to help get breast milk into bottles without spilling a drop. It eases breast-to-bottle journey by making breast milk storage less hectic and more hygienic. Featuring an Oxygen Barrier which slows down the oxidizing of breastmilk enzymes which are the cause of breast milk odour. It also comes with a built-in heat sensor that helps you attain the perfect feeding temperature! Made of double-layer premium LDPE/PET plastics that are freezer safe and provide an additional layer of oxygen barrier to slow down oxidizing of breastmilk enzyme. This will preserve breast milk freshness and taste after freezing.

FDA certified & BPA Free
Oxygen barrier - slow down the oxidizing of breastmilk enzyme which are the cause of breast milk odour
Reduce contamination - MyLO Breast Milk Storage Bags comes with separate milk pouring spout instead of using the same bag's mouth which could have been contaminated by germs on dirty thumbs & fingers.
Genius thermometer - Built-in heat sensor for perfect feeding temperature
Day and night indicator tab for easy labelling on daytime and nighttime breastmilk
Premium grade plastic - 2 thick layers of premium LDPE/PET plastic with 0.5mm edge seal prevent the leaking of breast milk
Contains 10 bags per box
Double zip lock for leak-proof and tight sealing
Write-on-tab designated area allows the name, date and volume to be written clearly without any risk of ink contamination and puncturing the bag
Safe for refrigerator/freezer storage
Wide and sturdy opening for easy filling
Self-standing bottom for effective storage and thawing – easily sit or lay flat on your freezer shelf for fast freezing and thawing
Clean and safe - MyLO Breast Milk Storage Bag ensures cleanliness is pre-sterilized and uses only baby-safe material that is free from carcinogens (BPA Free)

name: Laptop
description: The family unit comprises of client, husband and their 3 school-going children (aged 8, 9 and 13). Client's husband is currently the sole breadwinner of the household as client has been assessed to be temporarily unfit for work for a 3-month period given her mental health needs, and the current household income is barely sufficient to meet the basic needs of the family of 5. Client is in the process of seeking assistance and support from relevant community agencies in sustaining the basic needs of the family in view of the significantly lowered household income. Client hopes to seek support in securing a pre-loved laptop for her children's educational needs, especially her eldest child in her transition to secondary school.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre – Hougang and Buangkok
contact.name: Sabrina Than
